xwikidoc.name: CatalogSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('Catalog.Code.CatalogClass')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_course"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('course', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Course') : $doc.display('course') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_year"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('year', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Year') : $doc.display('year') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_content1"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content1', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Mesaj') : $doc.display('content1') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_labFormula"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('labFormula', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Formula nota fina laborator') : $doc.display('labFormula') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_totalFormula"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('totalFormula', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Formula punctaj total') : $doc.display('totalFormula') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_finalStateFormula"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('finalStateFormula', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Formula situatie finala') : $doc.display('finalStateFormula') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Catalog.Code.CatalogClass_0_studentGroups"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('studentGroups', false, false))</label>## (% class="xHint" %)$services.localization.render('Student Groups') : $doc.display('studentGroups') ))) {{/html}}
#set ($columnsProperties = { 'doc.title': {"link":"view"}, 'doc.location': {"html":true}, 'doc.date': {}, 'doc.author': {"link":"author"}, '_actions': {"sortable":false,"filterable":false,"html":true,"actions":["edit","delete"]} }) #set ($options = { 'className': 'Catalog.Code.Grupa_Class', 'translationPrefix': 'catalog.livetable.', 'extraParams' : "&location=${doc.space}", 'tagCloud': true, 'rowCount': 15, 'maxPages': 10, 'selectedColumn': 'doc.title', 'defaultOrder': 'asc' }) #set ($columns = ['doc.title', 'doc.location', 'doc.date', 'doc.author', '_actions']) #livetable('catalog' $columns $columnsProperties $options) {{/velocity}}
